document.full_text: tucked into a sprawling budget deal nearing passage on capitol hill is a proposal that would make the gray wolf the first creature ever removed from the endangered species list by an act of congress.
document.title: u.s. spending bill would lift federal wolf protections
lines_and_colors: tucked into a sprawling budget deal nearing passage on capitol hill is a proposal that would make the gray wolf the first creature ever removed from the endangered species list by an act of congress.
